html: Then—We speak with 17-year-old Palestinian activist #AhedTamimi in her West Bank village of Nabi Saleh, freed after eight months in an Israeli prison. Watch 8-9AM ET: http://democracynow.org pic.twitter.com/BNBSNfMbym
text: Then—We speak with 17-year-old Palestinian activist #AhedTamimi in her West Bank village of Nabi Saleh, freed after eight months in an Israeli prison. Watch 8-9AM ET: http://democracynow.org pic.twitter.com/BNBSNfMbym

html: 17-year-old Ahed Tamimi has confronted Israeli soldiers multiple times in defense of her family. "I grew up in a family where I got used to seeing prisoners, the injured, and martyrs," she says. "It reached a level where we were just saying, 'Enough. Enough with the occupation.'"pic.twitter.com/yGgpBVTNch
text: 17-year-old Ahed Tamimi has confronted Israeli soldiers multiple times in defense of her family. "I grew up in a family where I got used to seeing prisoners, the injured, and martyrs," she says. "It reached a level where we were just saying, 'Enough. Enough with the occupation.'"pic.twitter.com/yGgpBVTNch

html: Palestinian teen Ahed Tamimi reflects on her freedom, on-air now at http://democracynow.org : "I hope all prisoners, men and women, live to experience this joy. Of course, my joy is incomplete because my brothers and sisters remain in prison, and I hope that they are liberated"pic.twitter.com/qMDoZoVhtw
text: Palestinian teen Ahed Tamimi reflects on her freedom, on-air now at http://democracynow.org : "I hope all prisoners, men and women, live to experience this joy. Of course, my joy is incomplete because my brothers and sisters remain in prison, and I hope that they are liberated"pic.twitter.com/qMDoZoVhtw

text:
It's time for a New York that works for all of us.

On June 26th, we can make it happen - but only if we have the #CourageToChange.

html: Saturday night Paramount theatre Asbury Park Boardwalk. They knocked down the Mayfair, they knocked down Saint James, they swiped the copper roof off the Casino. I was born in Fitkin hospital & lived in Asbury Park. They can’t have that. That’ll always belong to us!
